channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 22:20 Alarm repulse in Zaporizhzhya region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Pologiv district- Zaporizhzhya district
item.description: 🟡 22:20 Alarm repulse in Zaporizhzhya region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Pologiv district- Zaporizhzhya district#Запоризька_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 22:20 Repulse of alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in: - Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Chervonogrigorivska territorial community
